item.title: China Green Agriculture Inc 10-K
item.description: China Green Agriculture Inc, which is in the Agriculture Chemicals [2870] industry, SEC 10-K filing on November 10, 2022 had 34901 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: june - 402 instances company - 396 instances 30 - 389 instances 2022 - 323 instances prc - 293 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
